definition: one the first colonists or settlers in a new territory, open up and explore a new area
details:
noun
- one the first colonists or settlers in a new territory
= example: one the first colonists or settlers in a new territory
- someone who helps to open up a new line of research or technology or art
= synonyms: innovator, trailblazer, groundbreaker
verb
- open up and explore a new area
= example: open up and explore a new area
- take the lead or initiative in
= synonyms: initiate
- open up an area or prepare a way
= example: open up an area or prepare a way
= synonyms: open up
